Post.title: Hello World
Post._content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)
Post.raw:

title: Hello World
---
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/one-command-deployment.html)

Post.title: Docker + Hexo + Vercel +
Post._content:
`catistrue.com` 

**Hexo+GitHub Page****Node.js**
  Docker  + GitHub Actions  +  

**CI/CD **

 hexo d
     Markdown  git push
    GitHub GitHub Actions 
    

 ** ->  ->  -> ** 

---

### 
****  Docker  Hexo Git 

#### 1. 

*   **Docker Desktop**Docker
*   **Git**
*    GitHub 

#### 2.  Hexo  Docker
Windows  PowerShell  Git Bash

```bash
# 1. 
mkdir my-blog
cd my-blog

# 2.  Docker  Hexo ( Node)
#  node  hexo
#  Docker 
docker run --rm -v "$(pwd):/app" -w /app node:18-alpine sh -c "npm install hexo-cli -g && hexo init ."

# 3.  npm 
docker run --rm -v "$(pwd):/app" -w /app node:18-alpine npm install
```

#### 3. 
 `my-blog`  `docker-compose.yml` ****

```yaml
version: '3'
services:
  hexo:
    image: node:18-alpine
    container_name: hexo-dev
    working_dir: /app
    volumes:
      - ./:/app
    ports:
      - "4000:4000"
    # 
    command: sh -c "npm install && npx hexo server -p 4000 -i 0.0.0.0"
```

#### 4. 

```bash
docker-compose up
```
 `http://localhost:4000` Hexo  `Ctrl+C` 

---

###  GitHub 
****  GitHub Actions 

#### 1.  GitHub 
*    GitHub  `.github.io` (`Public` GitHub Pages)

#### 2. 
 `my-blog` 
```bash
#  .gitignore (Hexo  node_modules, public, db.json)
git init
git branch -M main
git remote add origin <SSH>
git add .
git commit -m "Initialize blog"
git push -u origin main
```

#### 3.  GitHub Pages 
 `.github/workflows/deploy.yml`
* GitHub Pages/*

```yaml
name: Deploy Blog

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main #  main 

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout source
        uses: actions/checkout@v3

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v3
        with:
          node-version: '18'

      - name: Install Dependencies
        run: npm install

      - name: Build Hexo
        run: npx hexo generate

      - name: Deploy to GitHub Pages
        uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3
        with:
          github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          publish_dir: ./public

```

** Push**

 GitHub  `Actions` 

![](/images/image-1.png)

 GitHub  Actions  build
![](/images/image-2.png)

 `sh: 1: hexo: Permission denied`  `Exit code 127`** Windows  `node_modules`  GitHub **

##### 
1.  Windows  Docker  Windows  `node_modules`
2.  Windows  LinuxGitHub Actions 
3.   GitHubActions  Linux  `node_modules`  `hexo` 

##### 

** Git  `node_modules` GitHub Actions **

****

1 .gitignore
 `.gitignore` 
 `node_modules`

```powershell
# Windows PowerShell 
Add-Content .gitignore "node_modules/"
Add-Content .gitignore "public/"
Add-Content .gitignore "db.json"
```

2 Git 
****Git 

```bash
# 1.  Git  node_modules ()
git rm -r --cached node_modules

# 2.  public 
git rm -r --cached public

# 3. 
git add .
git commit -m "Fix: remove node_modules from git tracking"
git push
```

3 GitHub Actions 
 `git push` GitHub Actions 
 `Install Dependencies`  Linux `hexo generate` 

---


 `Settings -> Pages` source  `gh-pages` 
 `https://catistrue.github.io/` 

---

### or

:  + Docker  +  

  DNS + Vercel 

  Serverless  Hexo + Git  + Vercel  +  DNS   JAMstack 


---

### 

 **15-20 **

#### 1 

1.  ****
2.  ****
    *    ****
    *    **** 
    *   **

---

#### 2

1.  ****
    *    ****
    *   `https://dnspod.cloud.tencent.com/`

2.  ****
    *    `CatIsTrue`
    *   .com / .cn / .net

3.  ****
    *   **** **`.com`** `.cn` `.net`
    *    **** -> ****
    *   `.com`

4.  ****
    *    **** ****
    *   ****
    *   ********
    *    1-10 
    *   **
    *   *3-5*

5.  ****
    *    ****  **** 
    *   

6.  ****
    *    .com  83 

7.  ****
    *   whois.cloud.tencent.com ( "whois")
    *  
    *   /Registrant
    *   -> 
    *     -> 
---

#### 3


 http://catistrue.com/ 



****

 `catistrue.com`****
1.  ****Vercel  GitHub
2.  DNS

****

`Vercel`

 (CI/CD ) GitHub Actions GitHub  **** **GitHub  + Vercel /** 

****
*   **GitHub Pages**
*   **Vercel** CDN GitHub Pages 
*   ****Vercel  GitHub  GitHub  `.md` Vercel  `hexo g` ** GitHub Actions **

---



#####  Vercel 
1.   [Vercel ](https://vercel.com/)  GitHub 
2.   **"Add New..."** -> **"Project"**
3.   GitHub  **Hexo ** **Import**
4.  **Vercel **
    *   **Framework Preset**:  `Hexo`
    *   **Build Command**: `hexo generate` ( `hexo g`)
    *   **Output Directory**: `public`
    *    **Deploy**

 Vercel 

#####  Vercel 
 Vercel 

1.  ** Vercel **
     -> **Settings** -> **Domains**

2.  ****
     `catistrue.com` 

3.  **Redirect catistrue.com to www.catistrue.com (Recommended)**
    ****

    *   ****
         Vercel `catistrue.com` ()  `www.catistrue.com` (www)
         `catistrue.com`  `www.catistrue.com` SEO CDN 


** "Add" ( "Save") **

Invalid ConfigurationDNSPod`@``www`


##### DNSPod
****
*    -> **DNS  DNSPod**
*   

**** Vercel

** `catistrue.com` **
*   ****`@`
*   ****`A`
*   ****`xx.xx.xx.xx` ( Vercel )

** `www` **
*   ****`www`
*   ****`CNAME`
*   ****`xxx.com` ( Vercel )

---


 Vercel 10

 **Invalid Configuration**  **Valid** 
![](/images/image-3.png)


#####  Hexo 
 Hexo 

1.   `_config.yml` 
2.   `url:` 
3.  `url: https://catistrue.com`
4.   GitHub

---

`https://catistrue.github.io/` ,`https://catistrue.com` , `https://www.catistrue.com` 
 

**ps**
SSL  DNS `ipconfig /flushdns`DNS

---

### 



1.  ****
    *    `xxx.md` 
    *    `source/_posts` 
    *    Git  GitHub
    *   **** Vercel  `catistrue.com` 

2.  ****
    *   **** Vercel 
    *   **** Vercel  GitHub 10

---
